data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Nathaniel S. R., Christidis, Les, Olsen, Jerry, Norman, Janette, Rheindt, Frank E. (2017): A new subspecies of Short-toed Snake-eagle from Wallacea determined from morphological and DNA comparison. Zootaxa 4358 (2): 365-374, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4358.2.9
